refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: p = distfun_nctcdf ( x , v , delta ) p = distfun_nctcdf ( x , v , delta , lowertail )

listitem.para: a matrix of doubles, the outcome.
a matrix of doubles, the number of degrees of freedom, v>0.
a matrix of doubles, the noncentrality parameter, delta is real
a 1-by-1 matrix of booleans, the tail (default lowertail=%t). If lowertail is true (the default), then considers P(X<=x) otherwise P(X>x).
a matrix of doubles, the probability.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Computes the Noncentral T cumulated distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.
Caution This distribution is known to have inferior accuracy in some cases.

refsection.title: Examples
